question_text: Which of the following best describes 'image restore' in the context of laptop storage migration?
answer_options: Reinstalling the OS from an official recovery USB
Copying individual user files to a new drive
Creating an identical drive structure on a replacement device
Formatting and partitioning a new SSD
correct_answer: Creating an identical drive structure on a replacement device
explanation: An image restore duplicates not just files, but also the partition table, boot record, and OS settings onto a new drive.
